name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2011
description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) The Games on Demand version supports English, French. Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual". Pro Evolution Soccer has always been regarded as the quality soccer title, but PES 2011 has undergone the most important improvements made to date. Key features include total freedom over every action, a complete overhaul of all animations and the Master League mode is now online!
